front.title: PW ATM Pseudo Wire (PW) Emulation Network Management Information Base Using SMIv2

abstract.t: This memo defines an experimental portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it describes managed objects for modeling an adaptation of ATM VCs over a Packet Switch Network (PSN) as defined in the PWE3 Framework [FRMWK].
